code: import axios from'axios';import*as Actions from'../actions';export var FetchTMs=function FetchTMs(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("http://localhost:5000/teamMembers").then(function(res){dispatch(Actions.changeTMList(res.data));dispatch(Actions.initializeLocationArray(res.data));}).catch(function(err){console.log("ERROR: "+err);});};};export var UpdateTime=function UpdateTime(newTime){return function(dispatch){dispatch(Actions.changeTimeDelta(newTime));};};export var UpdateCircle=function UpdateCircle(c){return function(dispatch){dispatch(Actions.changeCircle(c));};};export var UpdateTMLocations=function UpdateTMLocations(c){return function(dispatch){dispatch(Actions.updateLocationArray(c));};};export var initializeLocationArray=function initializeLocationArray(c){return function(dispatch){dispatch(Actions.initializeLocationArray(c));};};export var UpdateStandup=function UpdateStandup(c){return function(dispatch){axios.post("http://localhost:5000/dailyStandups/add",{firstName:c.firstName,lastName:c.lastName}).then(function(res){if(res.status===200){dispatch(Actions.saveStandup(true));}else{dispatch(Actions.resetStandup(false));}}).catch(function(err){console.log("ERROR: "+err);});};};
